# thunder_debug_l2_redirect (Resource)

`thunder_debug_l2_redirect`: Debug L2 SSLi Redirect

__PLACEHOLDER__

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "thunder" {
  address  = var.dut9049
  username = var.username
  password = var.password
}
resource "thunder_debug_l2_redirect" "thunder_debug_l2_redirect" {
  level = 2
}
```
